animeDescription: The anime re-imagines the story with the characters Maya Kitajima and her rival Ayumi Himekawa being delinquent girls who both aspire to be the leader of the "Crimson Goddess" gang.
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Glass no Kamen', 'Other: Glass no Kamen (2005)', 'Sequel: Glass no Kamen Desu ga to Z', 'Side story: Himitsukessha Taka no Tsume x Glass no Kamen Desu ga']
